namelist.namelist_summary:
namelist_general.xml
Description General namelist to compute global contour plots of Evapotranspiration.
Author(s) Martin Evaldsson (SMHI, Sweden - Martin.Evaldsson@smhi.se) Edouard Davin (ETHZ, Switzerland - Edouard.Davin@env.ethz.ch Boris Orlowski (ETHZ, Switzerland - [not longer at eth]
Contributor(s)
Reference(s) Mueller and Seneviratne, 2014, doi:10.1002/2013GL058055 Mueller et al., 2013, doi:10.5194/hess-17-3707-2013
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ESMValTool project PI: Veronika Eyring (DLR, Germany - veronika.eyring@dlr.de)

MODELS.model: CMIP5_fx IPSL-CM5A-LR Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby17/sm_maeva/Data/CMIP5/IPSL-CM5A-LR/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_IPSL-CM5A-LR
CMIP5_fx CanESM2 Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/CanESM2/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_CanESM2
CMIP5_fx CSIRO-Mk3-6-0 Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/CSIRO-Mk3-6-0/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_CSIRO-Mk3-6-0
CMIP5_fx EC-EARTH Amon historical r12i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/EC-EARTH/r12i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_EC-EARTH
CMIP5_fx CNRM-CM5 Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/CNRM-CM5/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_CNRM-CM5
CMIP5_fx HadGEM2-ES Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/HadGEM2-ES/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_HadGEM2-ES
CMIP5_fx GFDL-ESM2M Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/GFDL-ESM2M/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_GFDL-ESM2M
CMIP5_fx MIROC5 Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/MIROC5/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_MIROC5
CMIP5_fx MPI-ESM-LR Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/MPI-ESM-LR/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_MPI-ESM-LR
CMIP5_fx NorESM1-M Amon historical r1i1p1 1980 2004 /nobackup/rossby16/sm_grini/Data/CMIP5/NorESM1-M/r1i1p1/historical/mon sftlf_NorESM1-M

diag.description: Simple evotranspiration plots using the LandFlux-Eval data set
